sentences.en: An elderly, wrapped in a cow's hide, appears and, laughing, to the nunnery high above us.
sentences.cn: 一位裹着牛皮年长的牧人出现了, 他笑着指着在我们上方远处的尼姑庵.

sentences.en: I like to think they were sent to a nunnery, but in any case they disappeared.
sentences.cn: 我认为她们可能被送到女修道院去了，但是不管怎么样她们还是消失了。

sentences.en: I'm a Catholic and I can go into a nunnery.
sentences.cn: “我是天主教徒,我可以去女修道院. ”

sentences.en: She left home and went to a nunnery.
She refused marriage and entered a nunnery.
sentences.cn: 她拒绝结婚而进女修道院修行.

sentences.en: Unsure whether I have been understood, I put in a brisk spurt to the nunnery.
sentences.cn: 不知道他是否明白我的意思, 我快步冲刺般地朝尼姑庵跑去.
